name: Crazy Critter Karting
description:
This is my entry for the LOWREZJAM 2019.

Sprites, sound effects and music were all made using RetroKit (for Unity).

Thanks to my girlfriend for making the hectic music. 😄

Sorry for the lack of WebGL build. Had some issues with it. I made a Linux build instead, but haven't been able to test it, so I don't know if it works.
